pullrequest.title: Don't shut down gazebo when removing a world -> gazebo7

content.raw:
Another flaky test failure ([full details here](https://gist.github.com/scpeters/70b3f54e3967e510b7ecac3d76ac8d1d)):

A memory fault occurred while copying a gazebo::msgs::Pose object while processing a Pose message in the ConnectionManager.

In the main thread, gazebo::rendering::Scene::Clear has been called and is deleting stuff. These two threads appear to be conflicting.
content.html:
Another flaky test failure (full details here):

A memory fault occurred while copying a gazebo::msgs::Pose object while processing a Pose message in the ConnectionManager.

In the main thread, gazebo::rendering::Scene::Clear has been called and is deleting stuff. These two threads appear to be conflicting.
